byline.original: By PEGGY POST, ANNA POST, LIZZIE POST and DANIEL POST SENNING

snippet: “Scientific and medical advancements have made life easier over the years, but the stresses and strains that come with population density, technological advancements, 24/7 news and entertainment media, and a redefinition of the family have resulted...
lead_paragraph: “Scientific and medical advancements have made life easier over the years, but the stresses and strains that come with population density, technological advancements, 24/7 news and entertainment media, and a redefinition of the family have resulted in a whole new set of challenges.”
